question: Posted By Frank Cooper on April 30, 1998 at 20:06:46:I have had quadruple by-pass surgery and have been told that I have sufficient blood circulating through my heart.  I also have unstable angina  and numerous arteries that are partially blocked, but are too small for bypass surgery.  I take Lopressor and Vasotec daily, also Lopid.  I have diabetes and take Glucotrol and Glipizide to keep it in control.  I would like to know if I could benefit from the TMR procedure to eliminate the constant angina pain that I have.Frank Cooper
title: Tmr procedure
